sentences.en: A cold beer is the perfect foil for a curry.
sentences.cn: 冰镇啤酒是吃咖喱的绝配。

sentences.en: A massive arms-smuggling plan has been foiled by the CIA.
sentences.cn: 一项大规模的军火走私计划已被中央情报局挫败。

sentences.en: As expected, the 2 particles frequently went straight through the metal foil.
sentences.cn: 正如人们所想象的, 2粒子经常笔直地穿过金属膜.

sentences.en: Bake salmon in foil or poach in a light stock for 8-10 minutes.
sentences.cn: 用箔纸包烤或用清汤蒸煮三文鱼8至10分钟。

sentences.en: Chocolate is wrapped in foil to keep it fresh.
sentences.cn: 为保新鲜,巧克力用箔纸包起来.

sentences.en: Cover the chicken loosely with foil.
sentences.cn: 用锡箔把鸡肉松松地盖起来。

sentences.en: He pricks holes in the foil with a pin.
sentences.cn: 他用大头针在箔纸上戳一些孔。

sentences.en: He thought of her serenity as a foil for his intemperance.
sentences.cn: 在他看来，她的平静反衬出了他的放纵。

sentences.en: Milk bottle tops are made of tin foil.
sentences.cn: 牛奶瓶盖是用锡箔做的.

sentences.en: Modern gauges consist of metal foil in the form of a grid.
sentences.cn: 现代应变仪则由网格形式的金属片组成.

sentences.en: Most of the alpha particles would go right through the foil.
sentences.cn: 大多数α粒子总是笔直地穿过簿箔.

sentences.en: Pour cider around the meat and cover with foil.
sentences.cn: 在肉周围倒上苹果酒，然后以箔纸覆盖。

sentences.en: The chocolates are individually wrapped in gold foil.
sentences.cn: 巧克力用金箔纸一颗颗独立包装。

sentences.en: The simple stone floor is the perfect foil for the brightly coloured furnishings.
sentences.cn: 朴素的石材地板完美地衬托出色彩鲜艳的家具。

sentences.en: This beam of particles was directed at a thin gold foil.
sentences.cn: 该粒子束对准一块薄薄的金箔.

sentences.en: Varndell made his own reflector for these shots from a strip of humble kitchen foil.
sentences.cn: 瓦恩德尔用一狭条普通的厨房用箔纸自制了反光板来拍摄这些照片。

sentences.en: Wrap the foil over the fish.

words.tran_cn: 阻止（foil的过去式和过去分词）
[材]箔，金属薄片；衬托，烘托；[建]叶形片
衬托；阻止，挡开；挫败；贴箔于

phrases.tran_cn: 铝箔（作包装材料）；锡箔纸
箔纸，贴铝箔的纸基；衬底纸

trans.tran_cn: 面向文件的翻译语言（file-Oriented interpretive language）
箔，金属薄片，陪衬，陪衬物，（镜底的）银箔，（宝石等的）衬底，（船）翼
trans.tran_en: metal sheets that are as thin as paper, used for wrapping food

trans.tran_cn: 衬托；阻止，挡开；挫败；贴箔于
trans.tran_en: to prevent something bad that someone is planning to do

trans.tran_cn: 用…陪衬，衬托，铺箔于，[建]给…加上叶形饰，挫败，使受挫折
trans.tran_en: to prevent something bad that someone is planning to do
